remarks.para: The class, introduced in iOS 9, allows layout constraints to be specified in code, in a fluent manner. For example:

In this example, the newly-created blueView has its height, width, leading, and trailing anchors defined as equal to that of a previously-defined greenView while its is set to be 10 logical pixels below the greenView's .
